description: Example: Read data from Google Sheets as input source
comment: This layout shows how to read from Google Sheets, transform columns, and write to PostgreSQL

inputSources.name: monthly_rfc_2026
inputSources.comment: Range format: 'WorksheetName!CellRange' - A2:AJ skips header row

outputs.name: postgres
outputs.comment: add_updated_at adds timestamp column (optional, defaults to false)
